segments.text: I want to have a few friends over for a dinner party to celebrate my birthday . Would you be able to come the next weekend on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be delighted to , John . Saturday did you say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if that's all right for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm pretty sure I'll be all right . In fact , I'd be delighted to come over and celebrate your birthday with you . What time are you planning to start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . If you could come around six thirty or seven o'clock , that would give us some time to chat a whit over a glass of wine before dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds fine . I'll be there around seven .
segments.speaker: S2
